title: Garden Reach Shipbuilders & Engineers Limited
summary: In terms of Regulation 24 (A) and Regulation 30 read with Para A of Part A of Schedule III and other applicable provisions of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, as amended (the SEBI Listing...
fullContent: In terms of Regulation 24 (A) and Regulation 30 read with Para A of Part A of Schedule III and other applicable provisions of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, as amended (the SEBI Listing Regulations ), we wish to inform you that the Company at its Board meeting held on 08 Aug 2025, approved the appointment of M/s Mehta & Mehta, Company Secretaries , a Peer Review Firm, as the Secretarial Auditor of the Company for a term of five (5) consecutive financial years commencing from FY 2025-26 to FY 2029-30, subject to approval of shareholders of the Company at the ensuing Annual General Meeting.Detailed disclosure in this regard is enclosed. |SUBJECT: General Updates

title: Garden Reach Shipbuilders & Engineers Limited
summary: In terms of Regulation 7 and 30 of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, as amended (the SEBI Listing Regulations ), we wish to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at its Meeting held...
fullContent: In terms of Regulation 7 and 30 of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, as amended (the SEBI Listing Regulations ), we wish to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at its Meeting held on 08 Aug 2025 has re-appointed M/s. Alankit Assignments Limited, a SEBI registered Registrar and Share Transfer Agent, as the Company s Registrar & Share Transfer Agent for a further period of one year with effect from 10 Oct 2025, in accordance with the Registrar & Share Transfer Agreement dated 18 Dec 2018 between the Company and M/s. Alankit Assignments Limited.The details in this regard are enclosed.This is for your information and record. |SUBJECT: General Updates

title: Baid Finserv Limited
summary: Pursuant to Regulation 47 of Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we are enclosing herewith the Newspaper Advertisement of Public Notice published in newspapers Nafa Nuksan (Daily newspaper of the State)...
fullContent: Pursuant to Regulation 47 of Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we are enclosing herewith the Newspaper Advertisement of Public Notice published in newspapers Nafa Nuksan (Daily newspaper of the State) and Financial Express (National daily newspaper) on Friday, August 08, 2025 informing, inter alia, about the following:a) 34th Annual General Meeting (AGM) scheduled to be held on Friday, September 12, 2025 at 3:00 p.m. (IST) through Video Conferencing/Other Audio-Visual Means;b) Manner of dispatch of 34th AGM notice and Annual report and registering/updating e-mail address and/or bank account details; andc) Manner for casting vote(s) through e-voting |SUBJECT: Copy of Newspaper Publication
